title: MadHatters
author: MadHatters
created_time: June 05, 2023, 05:29:56 AMLast edit: September 27, 2023, 02:06:55 AM by MadHatters
content: Hello, I have a localbitcoins account and the site is about to closeI want someone to help me verify my localbitcoins account to withdraw the funds that I have withheld0.002 btc will be paid for your help after verification because I have the funds blocked and it is unlocked once the verification is successfulverification is to upload your document and a live video of your facetg @Bladezero00PLEASE READ THAT ONLY DOCUMENTS THAT HAVE NEVER BEEN VERIFIED IN LOCALBITCOINS AND THAT THE DOCUMENTS ARE NOT LINKED TO ANY LOCALBITCOINS ACCOUNT

comments.author: TazL0v3r
comments.body: Did you ever get the situation handled? I can help if you're still in need
